peperoni.name: Pepperoni
peperoni.description: Lots of pepperoni, and lots of cheese! This firm favourite deserves it’s place at the top of the WeLovePizzs list.

supreme.name: Supreme
supreme.description: Hot on the heels of pepperoni is Supreme, THE pizza I grew up with. The one rule I have about supreme? It’s gotta have at least TWO meats. Otherwise, it’s just another pizza.

hawaiian.name: Hawaiian (Ham & Pineapple)
hawaiian.description: If you think you don’t like Hawaiian pizza, that’s because you haven’t tried homemade! I used to be one of "those people".

bbq.name: BBQ Meatlovers
bbq.description: You don’t even need to use a fancy BBQ sauce here. Any generic store bought BBQ sauce is fine – this one is all about the toppings!

garlicButterPrawnsAndChilli.name: Garlic Butter Prawns & Chilli
garlicButterPrawnsAndChilli.description: Huge Aussie favourite, a pizza topped with garlic prawns AND finished with a drizzle of garlic butter. Heaven in the form of a pizza!

sausageAndKale.name: Sausage & Kale
sausageAndKale.description: If there was ever a way to get someone to eat kale, this is it!

margherita.name: Margherita
margherita.description: Classic Italian favourite, one of the best examples of how simple is best! This pizza truly is magnificent.

capricciosa.name: Capricciosa (Ham, Artichoke, Mushrooms, Olives)
capricciosa.description: This is a magnificent combination and a firm WeLovePizza Family favourite!

quattroFormaggio.name: Quattro Formaggio (Four Cheese Pizza)
quattroFormaggio.description: This combination of cheeses is just spectacular! The little pops of blue cheese is sheer perfection.

prosciuttoAndRocket.name: Prosciutto & rocket
prosciuttoAndRocket.description: Another firm favourite, paper thin slices of prosciutto is perfect paired with peppery rocket (arugula). I could eat this every day!

cheeseAndGarlic.name: Cheese & Garlic
cheeseAndGarlic.description: Garlic bread – in pizza form! You’ll love the oregano flavour in this.

potatoAndRosemary.name: Potato & Rosemary
potatoAndRosemary.description: Carb on carb perfection. The first pizza I request at every family pizza night! The pops of rosemary flavour in this is just divine.
